Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory180.png'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The Babylonia members and the Ascendants have both arrived near the Observatory. Dispatching guards now...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Send guards to clean out the Corrupted before they damage the relics.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'That course of action will lower our chances of victory.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Those relics are a precious part of Kowloong. Go and give the orders, Huaxu.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Understood.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'If they want to climb up here to the Observatory, let them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'In this very yard...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I will destroy them all.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory176.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: '...This leads up to the Observatory.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'After a long trek, Gabriel finally arrives at the base of the Observatory. Here inside the light wall, free of the flames of war, Gabriel is almost like a theater actor waiting for the audience.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "The Corrupted I've brought should create enough of a diversion. This tower should hold what I seek.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Gestalt-like creation must be inside, but the tower will certainly be littered with traps.'}
{3: 'Direct confrontation does not concern Gabriel, but unforeseen circumstances—the prospect of disappointing Luna—does.'}
{3: 'And so, he hides.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, we're not far from the tower's base now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'No guards... Are they welcoming us in?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'More like a display of arrogance.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Prime', 3: 'Stop right there, invaders!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Still tailing us, huh... Commandant, if we go in like this, we'll get sandwiched!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Defeat the enemies first!', 3: '35', 4: 'Gotta get in the tower now.', 5: '37'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We've left most of them behind already. Now let's take care of the rest here!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Can't afford to get stalled... I think I just caught a glimpse of Gabriel.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Okay, I'll be the decoy, Lee and Liv can get rid of them.", 4: '1'}
